title: [backlog] Oracle Cloud Storage Support
body:
Option to support Oracle Cloud Storage
https://github.com/oracle/oci-python-sdk

### Community Help Opportunity
This is a good opportunity for community help since there are 3 existing implementations, and the desire is to implement the functions to the same specification. 

### Requires implementing similar to gcp, azure, aws ones here:
1) a connector, https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/walrus/methods/connectors/azure_connector.py
2) data tools,  https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/shared/data_tools_core_azure.py
3) tests, connection, read, write, etc.
4) document
5) add to various config options
may be other little things

### For examples, there are implementations for gcp, azure, aws to look at:

Example Azure
The interfaces needed for joining existing unified APIs functions from L30 to L241  (after that is legacy)
https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/shared/data_tools_core_azure.py#L30
https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/shared/data_tools_core_azure.py#L241

Example GCP
https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/walrus/methods/connectors/google_cloud_storage_connector.py
https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/shared/data_tools_core_gcp.py

Example AWS
https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/walrus/methods/connectors/s3_connector.py
https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/shared/data_tools_core_s3.py

### little things
add class here after https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/shared/data_tools_core.py#L73
add config
https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/shared/settings/settings.py#L51

add config to docker compose
https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/blob/master/docker-compose.yaml
